entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who has an appointment with Mrs Cole. He is described as having an eccentric appearance.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as following Dumbledore and the older Dumbledore through the front door.

entities.name: mrs cole
entities.description: Mrs Cole is introduced as the matron of the building. She is mentioned as being summoned by the scruffy girl.

entities.name: the older dumbledore
entities.description: The older Dumbledore is mentioned as following Harry and the current Dumbledore through the front door.

entities.name: the scruffy girl
entities.description: The scruffy girl is introduced as opening the door for Dumbledore. She is described as wearing an apron.

relationships.description: Dumbledore has an appointment with Mrs Cole, who is the matron of the building.
Harry follows the older Dumbledore through the front door.
